to_label: Set the title of the plot to 'Figure 1' using the title function. To bold the word 'Figure' but not '1', use LaTeX formatting within the title string. from_label: Set the title of the plot to 'Figure 1' using the title function. To bold the word 'Figure' but not '1', use LaTeX formatting within the title string. The LaTeX command for bold text is '\bf{}'. Enclose the LaTeX expression in a raw string (prefixed with 'r') to ensure proper interpretation of the backslashes.
to_label: The final title string is r"$\bf{Figure}$ 1", which will render 'Figure' in bold and '1' in normal text.
